title: 04/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin shares the latest insight on the top QB prospects ahead of the draft and why he starting to buy in on Mac Jones as the 49ers selection at 3rd overall. Find out which top team in the NBA right now Colin thinks is “unlikable”. He also shares his latest mock draft as everything is starting to become clearer for the top 5 picks. Plus, Joel Klatt joins the show defending Heisman Trophy winner Devonta Smith’s potential to translate to the NFL.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
